sourcesContent:
import { Container } from '../style'; const RefundBasics = () => { return ( Refund policies (Learner’s side)

Refund policies

For Live Classes

If the learner or parent choose to cancel their enrollment in the class at least 24 hours before the published start of the class, they will be eligible for a full refund.{' '}

Refunds for cancelling the enrollment after the 24 hour grace period will be subject to the evaluation of the Tagpros Admin.

Teacher’s makeup session

For classes with three or more sessions, teachers are eligible for a makeup session. The makeup session is an extra scheduled session of class that may be used when a teacher is unable to meet the learners on another scheduled day of class.

Teacher absences

Should the teacher miss two or more sessions, the entire class will be canceled and full refunds will be provided to enrolled students.

How we handle refunds

The teacher will return the money to us in the event of a refund, and we will then give it to the parent or learner. To make sure that all reimbursements are secure and properly documented, we do not allow direct transactions between teachers and parents. Refunds will be processed through PayPal and credited to the Tagpros account you are currently logged into.

Payment gateway fees

Our payment gateway (PayPal) charges a service fee of around $1 per transaction. However, depending on the circumstances of the case, Tagpros may waive the deduction of the payment gateway fees from the full refund.

Tagpros reserves the right to change payment and refund policies without prior notice.

If you have any questions, you may email{' '} customercare@tagpros.us

 

Refund policies (Teacher’s side)

Payment Policies

For classes with 6 sessions or less

The teacher will receive payment for the class within 5-10 working days after the last session of the course.

For classes with more than 6 sessions

The payment will be given through installments, which will be paid within 5 working days at the end of each month within the duration of the course.

How do I get paid?

Teachers are required to have a working Paypal account because all payments are made through Paypal. Tagpros’ development team is working hard to enable payments through other channels, but Paypal is the only option for now.

Currency of the payout

We will be handing out the payments via PayPal in USD. It will be under the teacher’s discretion on when he\she will covert the payment into PHP.

 

Refund policies

For live classes

If the learner chooses to cancel his or her enrollment to the class before the first session, he or she is eligible for a full refund.{' '}

Teacher’s makeup session

For classes with three or more sessions, teachers are eligible for a makeup session. The makeup session is to give teachers more time to give learners a better learning experience. The makeup class session is an extra scheduled session of class that may be used when a teacher is unable to meet the learners on another scheduled day of class.{' '}

Teacher absences

Should the teacher miss two or more sessions, the entire class will be canceled and full refunds will be provided to enrolled students.

How we handle refunds

The teacher will return the money to us in the event of a refund, and we will then give it to the parent or learner. To make sure that all reimbursements are secure and properly documented, we do not allow direct transactions between teachers and parents. Refunds will be processed through PayPal and credited to the Tagpros account you are currently logged into.

Tagpros reserves the right to change payment and refund policies without prior notice.

); }; export default RefundBasics;
